name: Glowmentum
description:
This is Glowmentum, a first-person parkour game where you grapple your way through levels set in a neon 80's style. Beat the levels as fast as you can with tight controls and extreme speed, and try going for a 3-star rating if you want to challenge yourself! Be sure to let me know if you get any crazy times :)

This game was made for my minor during my game development course, and I am planning on updating it further in the future.
